_header: That I have been long about
Subjects: devil, speech of a; sermons, verse in
_description: Speech of a frustrated devil — one quatrain

OxfMert248.Transcription:
Þat ich haue ben longe a boutal haf i lorn a pon þis
                    niȝtBeþ bodi & soule i sholde haue hadbot mer[c]y haue
                    for don my riȝt
